Name: Pimm's Cup (or Classic Pimm's)
Instructions: POUR Pimm's into glass half filled with ice. Add fruit and fill glass with more ice. TOP with equal parts lemonade and ginger ale (or just use lemonade, or ginger ale). Lightly stir prior to serving.
Review: You've not properly experienced an English summer until you've drunk one of these whilst sheltering from the rain.
History: See our Fruit Cups and Pimm's page for more information.
